title.en: Moto Maou-sama to Koisuru Hana ~Kazoku ni Suterareta Ma no Ouzoku ni Metoraremashita~

altTitles.ja: 元魔王様と恋する花〜家族に捨てられたら魔の王族に娶られました〜

altTitles.ja-ro: Moto Maou-sama to Koisuru Hana - Kazoku ni Suterareta Ma no Ouzoku ni Metoraremashita

altTitles.en: A Flower in Love with the Former Demon King ~Abandoned by My Family, I Got Married to the Demon King~
Flowers In Love With The Former Demon King

description.en:
All-ages shoujo manga based on a TL/R-18 doujinshi by the doujin circle Hanamushiro.

Kanon, the daughter of an aristocrat, was preparing for a political marriage that her step-mother forced upon her. However, on the day before her wedding, she gets kidnapped by bandits for money. Even worse, her family abandons her and so the bandits decide to sell her to demons instead! Trapped in a desperate situation, the one she calls out to for help turns out to be the former demon king!

A marriage love story featuring an unlucky young lady and the former demon king♡

(Source: Palcy)
description.ja: 貴族の令嬢・カノンは、義母に押しつけられた政略結婚をひかえていた。しかし嫁入りの前日、金銭目的の盗賊にさらわれてしまう。さらに、家族に見放され、魔族に売られてしまうことに！ 絶体絶命のピンチに声をかけてきたのは、元魔王様！？　不幸な令嬢×元魔王様の娶られラブ♡
